name: Village
description:
A young boy has come to a distant village to visit his grandmother. Arriving at the final station, in some wilderness, we find newspaper clippings on the platform. This is where our tangled story begins. The mysterious disappearance of residents in a remote Russian village is investigated by the grandson of one of the residents. The atmosphere of the Russian countryside, the supernatural and detective investigation for fans of twisted plots.

As you pass, you will need to find keys and open locked rooms. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the village abandoned houses, factory. Collect batteries for your flashlight. Find clues and put the whole story together in a single picture. The darkness can conceal various mysteries.


F - flashlight, Tab - inventory
In-game controls WASD - move, left mouse button - pick up an item. Right mouse button - inspect the item.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple control;
- interesting gameplay
